widget.label: Magebees::Mostviewed Products Widget
widget.description: List of Products that are set as Mostviewed

option.name: list_default
option.label: Mostviewed Products Images and Names Template

parameter.name: wd_show_heading
parameter.label: Display heading
parameter.description: Select Yes for display page heading.

parameter.name: wd_slider
parameter.label: Add Slider For Product
parameter.description:
Select Yes for display Slider.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_no_of_product
parameter.label: Number of Product to Display
parameter.description: Show number of products in main block

parameter.name: wd_products_per_row
parameter.label: Number of items per row in Main Block
parameter.description:
Show number of products per row in main block.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_mostviewed
parameter.label: Select Mostviewed Products Type
parameter.description: You can display all products or display by categories.

parameter.name: wd_product_type
parameter.label: Mostviewed Products
parameter.description:
Auto >> Show system generated products.
Manually >> Show manually added products.
Both >> Show both system generated and manually added products.

parameter.name: wd_sort_by
parameter.label: Sort By
parameter.description: Set attribute that is initially used to sort the mostviewed products list.

parameter.name: wd_price
parameter.label: Display Product Price
parameter.description:
Select Yes for display Product Price on frontend.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_description
parameter.label: Display Short Description
parameter.description:
Select Yes for display Short Description on frontend.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_compare
parameter.label: Display Add to Compare
parameter.description:
Select Yes for display the Add to Compare Link on frontend.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_wishlist
parameter.label: Display Add to Wishlist
parameter.description:
Select Yes for display the Add to Wishlist Link on frontend.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_cart
parameter.label: Display Add to Cart
parameter.description:
Select Yes for display the Add to cart button on frontend.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_out_stock
parameter.label: Display Out of Stock Product
parameter.description: Select Yes for display the out of stock items on frontend.

parameter.name: wd_ajaxscroll_page
parameter.label: Auto Load Next Page
parameter.description:
Select Yes for auto load next page content.
Note: This option depends on Ajax Infinite Scroll Pro Extension.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_autoscroll
parameter.label: Auto scroll products
parameter.description:
Select Yes for auto scroll featured products.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.

parameter.name: wd_navarrow
parameter.label: Show navigation arrow
parameter.description:
Select Yes for show navigation arrow for slider.
Note: Works only with Mostviewed Products Grid Template.
